name: Alzheimer's Disease Detection
description: A machine learning model for detecting Alzheimer's disease based on brain imaging data.
author: Sayyad Hussain

dataset.name: Alzheimer's MRI Dataset
dataset.description: A dataset containing MRI scans of individuals with and without Alzheimer's disease.

model.name: RestNet50v2
model.description: A convolutional neural network architecture for Alzheimer's disease detection.
